titleStmt.title: The poor prisoners petition for charity against Christmas.

notesStmt.note: In fact a petition ("The humble petition of the miserable poor prisoners in Woodstreet Compter,..") , two remonstrances ("The humble remonstrance of very many poore prisoners, .." and "This humble remonstrance was presented to the honourable the judges sitting at Salters Hall, ..") and a list of proposals ("The petitioners further humbly offer to your honors these ensuing proposalls.").
Reproductions of the originals the Harvard University Library (Early English books) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
